title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Social Studies Microlearning Design and Operational Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and understanding of foundational social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform self-directed learning activities at least three times per week using a mobile messenger similar to WhatsApp
Learners can accurately explain core social studies concepts in mobile environments at 80% or higher proficiency
Learners can interact with peers at least twice weekly and exchange feedback through mobile collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
